name: Karen Jensen
bio: Karen Jensen is a co-founder, the CEO, and Chief Scientist at MariPro Aquaculture. Karen was born in Mobile, AL and moved to Birmingham, AL in 2010 to attend the University of Alabama at Birmingham, where she earned her Bachelor’s degree in biology in 2014 and her Master’s degree in biology in 2016. After graduation, she dove into her passion for aquaculture, serving in both the academic and public service sectors. At MariPro, Karen brings her technical and practical knowledge of aquaculture as well as her passion for sustainable food production and food security worldwide.

name: Matthew Bach
bio: Matthew Bach is a co-founder, the President, and CFO at MariPro Aquaculture. A native of Mobile, AL, Matthew earned his Bachelor of Science in Mathematics from Auburn University in 2014. Matthew has over 12 years of high-touch, customer facing experience in management, hospitality and customer service, and high-volume process optimization, having honed these skills most recently in Washington, DC. Matthew is known for his excellent communication skills, ability to analyze and optimize processes, and address customer needs thoroughly and consistently. At MariPro, Matthew is able to connect his passion for aquaculture with sustainable, socially responsible business practices.
